page.title: 20Old Buildings-New Uses
page.content: The old houses in Royston have changed alot.Some of the changes are the mueseum that used to be a Sunday School,an architects that used to be a church,a house that used to be a school,and flats that used to be houses.King James had a hunting lodge in Royston but now part of it is a fish & chip shop etc. The library used to be a school and the Premier Travel Agents used to be a court house. Modern houses in Royston have also had alot of changes.Doors have been renewed,painted and had new numbers put on them.Garages have had new doors on them and even been changed into new rooms,windows have been double glazed,and leaded.Gardens have been paved for parking and fenced.Extra features like lanterns ,brass handles and letter-boxes have also been added.
